CustomField.formula: IF (ISBLANK(Technical_Sales_Manager_ATR__r.FirstName) && ISBLANK(Technical_Sales_Manager_ATR__r.LastName), "",Technical_Sales_Manager_ATR__r.FirstName + " " + Technical_Sales_Manager_ATR__r.LastName + ",ATR/") + IF(ISBLANK(Technical_Sales_Manager_BGA__r.FirstName) && ISBLANK(Technical_Sales_Manager_BGA__r.LastName), "", Technical_Sales_Manager_BGA__r.FirstName + " " + Technical_Sales_Manager_BGA__r.LastName + ",BGA/") + IF(ISBLANK(Technical_Sales_Manager_D_S__r.FirstName) && ISBLANK(Technical_Sales_Manager_D_S__r.LastName), "", Technical_Sales_Manager_D_S__r.FirstName + " " + Technical_Sales_Manager_D_S__r.LastName + ",D&S")
CustomField.label: Technical Sales Manager(s)
